docs.lead_paragraph: ON behalf of New York City's neediest, The New York Times today opens its fifty-sixth annual Christmas appeal. Here and on the following pages are 100 stories of people who have been overwhelmed by misfortune and tragedy, people for whom there will be little cheer as the bright Christmas season approaches.

headline.main: NEW YORK'S 100 NEEDIEST CASES; FIFTY-SIXTH ANNUAL APPEAL

docs.abstract: Lrs on Nov 26 article on need for parents to establish authority over children
